entries.title_d: Now that the secret of the Massassi is out, the company wants to punish them for their deception. They have managed to discover the location of the vessel organizing the attacks and they have hired you to deal with the vessel.
entries.title: Yavin System: Destroy the
Leader
entries.quest_target_t: Destroy the Fake Massassi Command Ship
entries.quest_target_d: Destroy the command vessel and send a clear message to the Yavin 4 Mining Company's competitor.
entries.quest_location_d: The fake Massassi ship is located inside of the Yavin system.
entries.quest_escort_d: The job should be done cleanly. Any who are with the command vessel should also be destroyed.
entries.failed_escape: You let them get away. Hopefully we will get another shot at him. Return to the space station.
entries.destroy_escort: Take out the rest of that ships escort. We want to show the Corellia Deep Mining Company that we mean business.
entries.assassinate_success: Nice work. The Corellia Deep Mining Company will think twice before messing with us again.
entries.arrival_phase_2: command vessel has been sent to your flight computer.
entries.arrival_phase_1: Stand by for lock on the
command vessel. Once this vessel is locked, intercept and destroy it.
